content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-04-26 #24406 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
This PR is 95% name changes and code deletions which look fine, 3% adaption notes which I don't understand and 2% random new files which look like mistakes (to me)
Someone might want to look at all the exciting new files which we seem to be picking up and confirm that we don't actually want them.

Oh god... VS Code has this infuriating behavior where it just randomly commits all untracked files if you dare to click the wrong button in a confirmation dialog... usually I notice that when opening the PR, but that's not the nightly-testing workflow
So, no new files intended from my side
I've cleaned up and sent to bors.
I just reviewed -- the only thing I wrote which is worth saying was that one of the adaptation notes doesn't really give a path back to the original proof tomorrow, although maybe we don't care.
